verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H0413"\w* Jerusalem, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* thy speech flow towards \w the|strong="H6440"\w* holy places, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* come \w against|strong="H6440"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* sheath, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* forasmuch \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* cut off \w in|strong="H3068"\w* thee \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked, \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w go|strong="H3518"\w* forth \w out|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* sheath \w against|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* south \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* north.

\w That|strong="H1931"\w* all flesh \w may|strong="H1931"\w* know \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* drawn \w my|strong="H0559"\w* sword out \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w its|strong="H3808"\w* sheath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* turned back.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou, son \w of|strong="H3068"\w* man, mourn \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* breaking \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy loins, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* bitterness sigh \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: Why mournest thou? thou shalt \w say|strong="H3478"\w*: \w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* which \w I|strong="H7760"\w* hear: \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* cometh, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* every heart \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* melt, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* all hands \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* feeble, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* every spirit \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* faint, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* water \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* run \w down|strong="H6440"\w* every knee: behold \w it|strong="H7760"\w* cometh, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* done, saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

Son \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w*, prophesy, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* say: \w Thus|strong="H3651"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w* \w God|strong="H0413"\w*: Say: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* sharpened, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* furbished.

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sharpened \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w kill|strong="H2719"\w* victims: \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* furbished \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* glitter: thou removest \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* son, thou hast cut \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* tree.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* given \w it|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* furbished, \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H0120"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* handled: this sword \w is|strong="H1121"\w* sharpened, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* furbished, \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w it|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H0120"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* slayer.

Cry, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* howl, \w O|strong="H3069"\w* son \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* sword \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Israel, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* fled: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*, \w strike|strong="H3027"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy thigh,

\w Because|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* tried: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* overthrow \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sceptre, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w*, \w O|strong="H0136"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* strike thy hands \w together|strong="H1571"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* let \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* doubled, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* let \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* slain \w be|strong="H1571"\w* tripled: \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* great slaughter, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* maketh \w them|strong="H1121"\w* stand amazed,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* languish \w in|strong="H0176"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* multiplieth ruins. \w In|strong="H0176"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* gates \w I|strong="H3988"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* set \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dread \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sharp|strong="H2300"\w* sword, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* furbished \w to|strong="H1961"\w* glitter, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* ready \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3027"\w* thou \w sharpened|strong="H2300"\w*, go \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w or|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* way soever thou hast \w a|strong="H5414"\w* mind \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thy face.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w clap|strong="H5606"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w together|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* satisfy \w my|strong="H3605"\w* indignation: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoken|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* word \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, saying:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, set thee \w two|strong="H5221"\w* ways, \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* king \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w to|strong="H0413"\w* come: \w both|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* come forth \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H0120"\w* land: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* draw lots, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* consult \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* head \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* way \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w city|strong="H1931"\w*.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Rabbath \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H8179"\w* Ammon, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Juda unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H4616"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strong \w city|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Babylon stood \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* highway, at \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* two ways, seeking divination, shuffling arrows: \w he|strong="H6440"\w* inquired \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* idols, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* consulted entrails.

\w On|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H1571"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* divination \w for|strong="H0413"\w* Jerusalem, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w set|strong="H5117"\w* battering rams, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* open \w the|strong="H0413"\w* mouth \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H5221"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* lift \w up|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* voice \w in|strong="H0413"\w* howling, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w set|strong="H5117"\w* engines \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* gates, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w cast|strong="H5117"\w* \w up|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* mount, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* build forts.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* consulting \w the|strong="H0559"\w* oracle \w in|strong="H0413"\w* vain, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* imitating \w the|strong="H0559"\w* leisure \w of|strong="H3068"\w* sabbaths: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* remembrance \w the|strong="H0559"\w* iniquity \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H0859"\w* thus saith \w the|strong="H0935"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H3027"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* remembered \w your|strong="H7760"\w* iniquity, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* discovered \w your|strong="H7760"\w* prevarications, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* sins \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w appeared|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H0259"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* devices: \w because|strong="H3027"\w*, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* say, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* remembered, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w taken|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0935"\w* thou profane wicked prince \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* day \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* hath been \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* time \w of|strong="H1121"\w* iniquity:

Thus saith \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H0413"\w*: Remove \w the|strong="H3588"\w* diadem, \w take|strong="H7200"\w* \w off|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* crown: \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* hath exalted \w the|strong="H3588"\w* low \w one|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w brought|strong="H7043"\w* \w down|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* high?

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* shew \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* iniquity, iniquity, iniquity: \w but|strong="H1961"\w* this \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w* till \w he|strong="H3389"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* whom judgment belongeth, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* thou son \w of|strong="H5869"\w* man, prophesy, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* say: \w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* saith \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Lord God concerning \w the|strong="H1961"\w* children \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Ammon, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* concerning \w their|strong="H1961"\w* reproach, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* thou shalt say: sword, \w O|strong="H2142"\w* sword, \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* scabbard \w to|strong="H1961"\w* kill, \w be|strong="H1961"\w* furbished \w to|strong="H1961"\w* destroy, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* glitter,

Whilst \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* vain \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w regard|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* divine lies: \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w bring|strong="H2142"\w* thee \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* necks \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* wounded, \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* appointed day \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w come|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* time \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.

\w Return|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* thy sheath. \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* judge thee \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H0935"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* thou wast created, \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy nativity.

\w And|strong="H7311"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* pour out upon thee \w my|strong="H5493"\w* indignation: \w in|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fire \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* rage \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* blow upon thee, \w and|strong="H7311"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* give thee \w into|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hands \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H1364"\w* brutish \w and|strong="H7311"\w* contrive thy destruction.

Thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* fuel \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fire, thy blood \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* midst \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* land, thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* forgotten: \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoken|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.
